title: Rocket League sales revenue worldwide 2016
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 110.0 is found at Month June 2016 and the minimum is found at December 2015 where Month is 70.0.
The highest value at Month June 2016 is 1.57x times more than the lowest value at December 2015.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 110.0 is found at Month June 2016 and the minimum is found at December 2015 where Month is 70.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars of Month December 2015 is 1.57% smaller than the maximum value at June 2016.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Months.
The lowest value 70.0 at December 2015 is almost 1.22 times smaller than the average value 90.0.
